import React, { Component } from "react"; import tether from "../tether.png"; import { Web3 } from "web3"; class Main extends Component { render() { return (
Staking balance Reward balance
{this.props.stakingBalance} USDT {this.props.rewardBalance} RWD
Balance:{Web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.tetherBalnce, "Ether")}
); } } export default Main;
